Ah okay! I'm very glad you told me. ^_^
I do have a story in progress, actually. ^^ It's In Your Shadow I Walk, a 
SAISA pairing story.
But I also have another one which is called Moonlit Destiny, it's also with 
the SAISA pairing, but a cross over with my yaoi manga Demonic Obsessions. 
^^
And then there's another story, called In Eternity and Forever, which I 
finished and has been submitted to Nekkie's Ratnest for the fanfiction 
challenge, it's also a crossover with Demonic Obsessions...not a bad one, 
I'd say.

And thank you for complimenting my artwork. I'm very glad you think I draw 
well. I can honestly draw much, much better than the ones you've seen thus 
far. It's just sometimes I can do things that look awesome, and then I have 
days were nothing will look right.
(An example? http://www.deviantart.com/view/6623911/ )

Okay, I'm done shamelessly promoting myself now. *droops head*

Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."


-------

Just a little reminder that artwork, whether stories or graphics,
should be posted over on shq_spy_division so we can keep the files
here as factual as possible.  :-D

To my fellow wolves here, Miser Bellatrix does some wonderful artwork
and also writes (Miser, don't you have one in progress?  Or am I
confusing you with someone else?).  Definitely NOT lacking in brains!!

phil (who woke up to 91 messages in her inbox, including several
